alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln County through 115 AM CDT... At 1245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Hunter, or 12 miles northwest of Lincoln, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Beverly, Barnard and Ash Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for central Kansas.
